casebody.data:
2001-2916 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Michael Lewis GROSSIE. No. 2001-KO-2916. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Michael Lewis Grossie;-Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Rapides, 9th Judicial District Court Div. F, No. 255,686; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-0225.

Denied.
